title: Marketing Project Manager (with Paid Media Experience)
job_overview:
Company Overview
This digital marketing consultancy specializes in performance-focused growth strategies for ecommerce and DTC brands. The founder is an experienced operator in paid media, AI implementation, and client relationship management. The company is building a lean, efficient, and high-trust internal team to support a growing client roster with full-funnel marketing execution and systems support.

Role Summary
We are hiring a Marketing Project Manager to help stabilize internal operations, streamline client management, and support paid media fulfillment. This is a hybrid role that combines project coordination, light client communication, and digital marketing execution—with a strong emphasis on paid media structure and follow-through.
The role will start part-time (20 hours/week) with a goal to expand to full-time within 2 months based on fit and ramp-up. You’ll work directly with the founder, helping turn vision into structure and client opportunities into organized delivery.

Responsibilities

Client & Project Management
Collect client inputs and campaign requirements, and ensure assets and briefs are organized
Build out and maintain project dashboards (Notion, Monday, or similar)
Help define and implement workflows for onboarding, reporting, and fulfillment
Create templated client proposals from founder’s notes and ideas
Monitor and follow up on tasks delegated to internal and external teaUpgrade to see actual infombers
Support weekly reporting, light invoicing coordination, and tracking campaign performance metrics

Communication & Coordination
Draft and send client emails, updates, and proposals in professional tone, but with founder’s voice
Occasionally interface with clients via text/email and light voice calls (must be confident, clear, and warm communicator)
Track client requests, questions, and issues to ensure nothing falls through the cracks
Batch questions for the founder and implement a 1-3-1 problem/solution format when bringing issues forward

Marketing Fulfillment Support
Assist with campaign setup and coordination (especially Google Ads/Meta)
Translate founder direction into execution tasks for the media buyer
Review ad copy, landing pages, or keywords for completeness and logic
Help QA campaign builds and assist with ad-hoc tasks that improve operational efficiency

Ideal Candidate Profile

2+ years of experience in digital marketing, with exposure to paid media (Google Ads/Meta) campaigns
Strong project management background: able to bring structure to chaos without micromanagement
Proactive communicator who thrives in a fast-moving, vision-led environment
Tech-comfortable: can adapt to new platforms quickly and build systems in Notion, Google Drive, or PM tools
Sharp problem-solver who comes with solutions, not just questions
Comfortable working with founders who are creative and fast-paced (and a little all over the place!)
Detail-oriented without being rigid — able to ship quickly while maintaining quality
Strong written and spoken English; able to interact professionally with clients, but also direct and efficient internally

Bonus Skills
Interest in AI tools for marketing content creation and automation
Experience hiring or training junior teaUpgrade to see actual infombers
Ability to grow into a leadership role as the team expands
